src.game
Class Messages

java.lang.Object
  src.game.Messages

public class Messages
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton class used for sending messages to the gui and displaying them.

Author:
Darren Watts date 11/11/07

addLongMessage

private void addLongMessage(java.lang.String str)
Adds a message that is too long to fit on one line. It will split the line up based on the whitespace and call the addMessage method for each line after it is split up.

Parameters:
str - String : message to add

getMessages

public java.lang.String getMessages()
Returns the messages as a string for the GUI to display.

Returns:
String : The messages
